title: "AI Could Help Patients With Chronic Pain Avoid Opioids"
excerpt: "Cognitive behavioral therapy for pain that is supported by artificial intelligence renders the same results as guideline-recommended programs while requiring less clinician time, thus making the option more accessible for patients."
